mapper.select: select bid, title, content, tag, view_cnt, reg_id, reg_dt, edit_dt, cate_cd from tbl_board
select bid, title, content, tag, view_cnt, reg_id, reg_dt, edit_dt, cate_cd from tbl_board where bid=#{bid}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board(title, content, tag, view_cnt, reg_id, reg_dt, edit_dt, cate_cd) values(#{title}, #{content},#{tag},0,#{reg_id},now(),now(), #{cate_cd})
mapper.update: update tbl_board set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, tag=#{tag}, edit_dt=now(), cate_cd=#{cate_cd} where bid=#{bid}
update tbl_board set view_cnt=view_cnt+1 where bid=#{bid}
